full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SDOM GSUM BSLAB BYA RIN PO CHE'I PHRENG BA SKAL BZANG MGUL RGYAN CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @019B (CES SDOM GSUM BSLAB BYA RIN PO CHE'I PHRENG BA SKAL BZANG MGUL RGYAN CES BYA BA 'DI NI DPAL LDAN SMAD RGYUD GRVA TSANG GI GRVA RIGS SNGAGS RAM PA SBYIN PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS NYIN ZHAG PHRUGS RER THUN DRUG @020A *, ,TU SDOM GSUM GYI BSLAB BYA RNAMS LA BSNGO BGRANG BYA TSUL 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG DANG YANG DU NAN CHEN POS BSKUL ZHING, ,RANG DANG SKAL BA MNYAM PA GZHAN LA'ANG PHN DU NGE BA DANG, RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS GANGS RI'I KHROD 'DIR RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO SDOM GSUM GYI BSLAB BYA RNAM RGYAL BA RANG NYID KYI DGONGS PA JI BZHIN DU GSAL BAR MDZAD PA'I LUGS BZANG 'DI NYID SLAR YANG CHES CHER 'PHEL NA CI MA RUNG SNYAM DU SMON PAS, DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, 'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO'I 'DI NYID 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
